shortdesc.ph: Reports the transport-layer statistics of each remote video stream.

dlentry.dd: This callback is deprecated, please use instead.

section.p: This callback reports the transport-layer statistics, such as the packet loss rate and network time delay, once every two seconds after the local user receives a video packet from a remote user.
During a call, when the user receives the video packet sent by the remote user/host, the callback is triggered every 2 seconds.

plentry.pd: The ID of the remote user sending the video packets.
The network delay (ms) from the sender to the receiver.
The packet loss rate (%) of the video packet sent from the remote user.
The bitrate of the received video (Kbps).
